functional_requirements: Accept basic event parameters (type, duration, audience, objectives)
Generate comprehensive event agendas with appropriate time allocations
Create detailed schedules including sessions, breaks, and transitions
Suggest event formats and structures based on objectives
Plan multi-track or parallel session schedules
Provide suggestions for relevant speakers based on event theme
Recommend topics and session titles aligned with audience interests
Suggest panel compositions and discussion formats
Create speaker briefs and preparation guidelines
Generate introduction scripts for speakers
Plan timing and duration for different event components
Suggest venue layouts or virtual platform configurations
Create equipment and resource checklists
Generate run-of-show documents
Provide contingency planning suggestions
Generate automated reminders for organizers and participants
Create email templates for different event communications
Schedule milestone reminders throughout the planning process
Draft announcements and promotional materials
Provide countdown and preparation notifications
Support calendar system integration
Enable data export in common formats
non_functional_requirements: The system should be user-friendly and intuitive for non-technical users
The system should be scalable to handle events of varying sizes and complexities
The system should ensure data security and privacy for all user information
assumptions: The system will require internet connectivity for full functionality
Users will have varying levels of technical proficiency
Integration with existing event management platforms may vary in complexity
modules: Event Planning & Structure: This module allows users to input event parameters and generates structured agendas and schedules tailored to the event's objectives
Speaker & Topic Management: This module suggests relevant speakers and topics, helping organizers curate engaging content for their audience
Logistics Support: This module assists in planning the logistics of the event, including venue layouts, equipment checklists, and run-of-show documents
Reminder & Communication: This module automates reminders and communications, ensuring that all stakeholders are informed and prepared for the event
Integration Capabilities: This module facilitates integration with calendar systems and enables data export, enhancing workflow efficiency
